00040   // split by comma
00041   function splitter(str){
00042     var tmp = str.split(',');
00043     var arr = [];
00044     for(var i = 0; i < tmp.length; ++i){
00045       tmp[i] = tmp[i].split(':');
00046       arr[i] = {};
00047       arr[i].top = tmp[i][0];
00048       arr[i].left = tmp[i][1];
00049     }
00050     return arr;
00051   };
00052 };

00063 W.Skill.prototype.animate = function(){
00064   // rotate frames
00065   if(this.frame >= this[this.dir].length - 1){
00066     this.frame = 0;
00067   }else ++this.frame;
00068   
00069   //window.status = 'dir:'+ this.creature.dir +', this.frame:'+ this.frame;
00070   
00071   // flip frame
00072   this.creature.img.style.top = -this[this.creature.dir][this.frame].top +'px';
00073   this.creature.img.style.left = -this[this.creature.dir][this.frame].left +'px';
